flawed_nl_solution:
On weekdays it earns $600/weekday * 5 weekdays = $<<600*5=3000>>3000
During the weekend it earns twice as much each day so it makes ($600 * 2)/weekend day * 2 weekend days = $<<(600*2)*2=2400>>2400
Every week it earns $3000 + $2400 = $<<3000+2400=54000>>54000
By the end of the month, it earns $54000/week * 4 weeks = $216000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5400, not 54000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
